name: Lines 98 HD
description:
Lines 98 HD is based on Line classic and adds some new interesting features that make the game more fun and relaxed.

► Features:
- Supports Save/Load game
- Three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium & Hard
- Intuitive interface: 7 nice skins
- Supports undo
- Support Game Center leaderboard
- Very easy to play and relaxing logical game
publishers: CAT VIET SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT & MEDIA JSC
